thread.title: Xiaomi sells over 250,000 Redmi Note 4 units in 10 minutes
thread.title_full: Xiaomi sells over 250,000 Redmi Note 4 units in 10 minutes

title: Xiaomi sells over 250,000 Redmi Note 4 units in 10 minutes
text:
Xiaomi sells over 250,000 Redmi Note 4 units in 10 minutes Xiaomi sells over 250,000 Redmi Note 4 units in 10 minutes By January 24, 2017 “Xiaomi claims to have created a new record in online sales” 
Yesterday, Xiaomi held the first sale of its latest budget phablet, the Redmi Note 4 , on Flipkart and Mi.com. Today, the company has revealed that it sold more than 2,50,000 units of the Redmi Note 4 on both e-tailers in just 10 minutes. 
Xiaomi claims that it has created a new record in online sales by selling the largest number of devices in 10 minutes. The Redmi Note 4 will go on sale again on January 30th on Flipkart and Mi.com. 
For the uninitiated, the Xiaomi Redmi Note 4 ( review ) is available starting at Rs 9,999 (2GB RAM + 32GB storage), Rs 10,999 (3GB + 32GB) and Rs 12,999 (4GB + 64GB). It features a 5.5-inch full HD display, a Snapdragon 625 SoC, 13MP/5MP cameras, a fingerprint sensor, 4G, VoLTE, IR blaster, a 4,100mAh battery and MIUI 8 based on Marshmallow. Facebook Comments
